task_completion.description: Whether the given task was completed successfully or not

number_of_turns.description: The number of turns taken to complete the task

number_of_invalid_actions.description: The number of invalid actions performed during the task

number_of_thought_actions.description: The number of 'THOUGHT' actions performed during the task

task_efficiency.description: Evaluation of task completion considering the number of actions

environment_understanding.description: Evaluation of the understanding of the environment and its elements

strategy_adaptation.description: The ability to adapt to changes in the environment or task
